label: I-26 Photo 0368
description: House (freedman's cottage?) and shed (rear view) on site affected by the construction of Interstate 26 (I-26). Address: 20 Addison Street. Surveyor notations on back of photo:  "Dkt.: 10.503.  Property owner: C.C. Scott.  Tract: 94.  Station: 5918+80 Lt.  Date: Feb. 20, 1963.  In R/W - Bought."  [See collection description for explanation of surveyor notations.]
